title: She's On Top
description: In Lyons's Awesome Foursome series, which started with her erotic novel "Hot in Here," four girlfriends set out to explore their wildest sexual fantasies, and now it's Rina's turn.What happens when a woman with body image issues contacts her first love, remembering a gawky boy – and discovers he’s turned into a total hottie? Musician Rina has never forgotten the sensual rhapsody she experienced with pianist Giancarlo. Ten years later, she wants an encore of passionate sex culminating in a glorious, unforgettable climax. Giancarlo delights in providing it – and in convincing her to love her body the way he does. A 4 1/2 star Top Pick from Romantic Times BOOKreviews!
author: Susan Lyons
